positive_examples: This is an example of cyber influence operation.
The cyber influence operation demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed cyber influence operation in this context.
A typical case of cyber influence operation would involve these features.
The concept of cyber influence operation applies here.
An operation that leverages digital platforms and technologies to shape perceptions, opinions, or behaviors of target audiences.
negative_examples: This is an example of c t intelligence operation, not cyber influence operation.
This represents offensive information operation in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: CTIntelligenceOperation, or other types of OffensiveInformationOperation

definition: A coordinated campaign using digital means to shape public opinion or behavior.
